text: 6. a) Consider a spring-mass system without external force and friction described by ma" + kz =0, with mass m > 0, spring constant k > 0, and z(Â¢) is the deviation of the mass from its equilibrium position. Suppose the spring constant is k& = 8 and the spring is oscillating with frequency of 2 hertz (i.e. 2 full periods per second). Determine the mass m of the spring.
